title: Family Travel Hacks: Spring Break
description:
Traveling with kids is bound to be stressful and complicated... or is it? Karen Akpan, @TheMomTrotter, and Bethany Braun-Silva from Parenting.com are sharing tried and true travel hacks to make your family spring break a breeze -- whether you're headed to Hawaii, overseas, or just the next city over.

Send us an email with your best travel stories and tips at podcast@expedia.com or find us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram @Expedia!
